description:
The Holy Britannian Empire is an imperial monarchy and the most prominent superpower in the Code Geass universe. At the start of the series it controls well over one-third of the world: the entire Western Hemisphere (both American continents) as well as colonies known as "Areas" around the world, such as Japan (Area 11).
This organization entry is intended to cover only people who are part of the Britannian Empire in an official capacity, such as members of the nobility or imperial family or the military.
name: Shinsei Britannia Teikoku
